title: tyzen
author: tyzen
created_time: August 27, 2022, 01:34:59 AMLast edit: August 27, 2022, 01:50:12 AM by tyzen
content: Tyzen Wallet for Androidv 1.0Back-end server with PiWallet & Full Node Wallet to store coinDemo : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.tyzen.ioSource Code : https://github.com/tyzen-tzn/tyzen-wallet-androidBack-End : https://github.com/jfm-so/piWallet Thank YouFeatures :Login & Register12 words passphrase seedReal time price per coin in USD rateSend & ReceivePin codeLatest priceScan QR Code depositTransaction HistoryMany moreHidden Features :Multi CryptoETH & ERC20BNB & BEP20Auto set GAS and Satoshi miners fee at lower rateSwap coin via Changelly API more than 100+Contact :Discord : https://discord.gg/y3t4VyA9wbEmail : saka@tyzen.ioDonation :TZN : TdVGMV4R2X94vv4r9VTmeZkDvjNcTxZfvSBTC : 15mobuhSEuFwkNjbHRgLu6PC77XsMnsHXhLTC : MM1ParJb6jw5TwSqQoCwL1vu2Hz7sorWBuDOGE : D95yb8k8s2TxxyYGpMeWEYiNs6t8VAkzaxTRON : TXgiAzq9ia36NxkjswboEsn8v2DYk5VgicI am not responsible for any criminal acts committed by people who use Tyzen Wallet source code.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on August 27, 2022, 02:36:23 PMAlso, change your signature from gambling, at least on this account of yours since you want tyzen to be the face of this project. He's not wearing any signature, those are just forum advert banners that appear right after the OP. The slots are given to different services weekly after a successful auction

comments.author: AnotherAlt
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on August 27, 2022, 02:36:23 PMAlso, change your signature from gambling, at least on this account of yours since you want tyzen to be the face of this project. Bitcoin_Arena Already explained about the ad slot which you thought was a signature. I would like to add more about this. This user is On Newbie rank on this forum so far. You should be aware; Newbies can use 40 characters on their signature space. Also, I don't think I have seen animated Signature ever or at least animate on Hover. BTW, Quoted a post for a better understanding of Signature space.Quote from: theymos on February 26, 2014, 09:15:18 PM- Newbie: No styling (including links) allowed. Max 40 characters.- Jr. Member: Links allowed. Max 100 characters.- Member: Unlimited length.- Full: Color allowed.- Sr. Member: Size allowed- Hero: Background color allowedHe bought Copper Membership. That's why he was able to post an image.@tyzen, Project looks good. I haven't tried it yet. Since this is a wallet, You should add the 2FA feature.
